What is Proof of Virtue (PoV) and how does it enhance the PoS algorithm in the Verus Network?

Proof of Virtue (PoV) is a concept introduced by Verus to enhance its PoS (Proof of Stake) algorithm. PoV is inspired by the EigenTrust algorithm and aims to weight staking contests with both Verus stake and "Virtue", a special trust rating of identities within the network.

In the Verus Network, Virtue is a rare and valued property that drives correct behavior. It is not purchasable or saleable, but Verus holders can earn a small measure of Virtue by participating in activities that benefit the network, such as staking, attesting to facts, validating information, or providing other measurable benefits.

The Virtue system is designed to incentivize good behavior and reward contributors to the network. Over time, addresses can improve their earnings by increasing their Virtue weighting, which is based on their recorded activity and behavior.

Virtue has intrinsic value on the Verus network, and there will be methods for transferring it through wallet ownership, such as in cases of probate or other necessity. However, using Virtue as a tool for trading will not provide a secure or intended method of increasing one's stake.

The ultimate goal of PoV is to create a more secure and trustworthy network, where participants are incentivized to act in the best interests of the community. By incorporating Virtue into the PoS algorithm, Verus aims to create a more robust and reliable system that rewards good behavior and promotes a positive ecosystem.

Using a model similar to the EigenTrust algorithm, Verus will introduce the idea of Proof of
Virtue (PoV) enhancement to the PoS algorithm initially released in Phase I. In PoV, we
intend to weight staking contests with both Verus stake and “Virtue”, a special “currency”,
expected to be tracked on a Virtue autochain, and used as a trust rating of identities within
the network.
In a similar way to the “amount of stake” used when staking, Virtue will add another
component to the probability of being selected to process a block of transactions on the
Verus Network. Its probabilities upon introduction will not change returns on the Verus PoS
system, but addresses will gradually be able to improve earnings with a Virtue weighting –
based on recorded activity and behavior.
